document.full_text: senator carl kruger, a democrat, and william f. boyland jr., a democratic state assemblyman, had been under investigation into accusations that they exchanged favors for help raising campaign money.
document.title: brooklyn senator and assemblyman face corruption charges
lines_and_colors: senator carl kruger, a democrat, and william f. boyland jr., a democratic state assemblyman, had been under investigation into accusations that they exchanged favors for help raising campaign money.
